name: Chocolate peanut butter muffins
instructions: Preheat oven to 180 degrees. Grease 12 muffin tins.
In one bowl, mix: flour, chocolate chips, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a small bowl, mix: milk/water, peanut butter, oil, and egg.
Mix in a bowl of dry ingredients until dry ingredients are blended.
Bake for 20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
